column4: Hi .,.. anybody know where to find a howto about setting up a local Ubuntu mirror
let me put it this way ... i have to deploy ubuntu on 200 machines - and it would be nice if they were updated via a local mirror instead of using a lot of bandwidth "out-of-the-house"
ya could put the /var/apt/cache dir on a NFS share.
we were planning on that ... either that or using the intranet
